trans-unit.source: Defines the available color palette for a supported image type.
trans-unit.target: 定义可用调色板中为支持的图像类型。

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] image formats support image palettes.
trans-unit.target: 仅[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]图像格式支持图像调色板。

trans-unit.source: However, other image types can be used to define a BitmapPalette.
trans-unit.target: 但是，其他图像类型可以用于定义 BitmapPalette。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to define a BitmapPalette for an unsupported bitmap format does not result in an exception; the designated BitmapPalette is simply ignored.
trans-unit.target: 尝试定义为不受支持的位图格式 BitmapPalette 不会导致异常，则只需忽略指定的 BitmapPalette。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] supports both custom color palettes and predefined palettes defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]支持自定义调色板和预定义的调色板定义的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes>类。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> class with the specified colors.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>使用指定的颜色的类。

trans-unit.source: The colors to add to the custom palette.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到自定义调色板颜色。

trans-unit.source: The colors parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The colors parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The colors parameter is less than 1 or greater than 256.
trans-unit.target: colors 参数是小于 1 或更高版本超过 256 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> class based on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>类根据指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> is limited to a specified maximum color count.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>限制为指定的最大颜色计数。

trans-unit.source: If the `bitmapSource` already has a defined palette, the corresponding palette is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`bitmapSource`已定义的调色板，返回相应的调色板。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a new palette is constructed from an analysis of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 否则，分析了位图构造新的调色板。

trans-unit.source: The source bitmap from which the palette is read or constructed.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取或构造调色板的源位图。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of colors the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> can use.
trans-unit.target: 最大的颜色数新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>可以使用。

trans-unit.source: The bitmapSource parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The bitmapSource parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Get the colors defined in a palette.
trans-unit.target: 获取调色板中定义的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The list of colors defined in a palette.
trans-unit.target: 调色板中定义的颜色的列表。
